name.description: The name of the replacer, this will appear in the BoneMenu

description.description: The description of the replacer, this will appear in the BoneMenu

dependencies.description: Holds the mod.io dependencies required for the replacer to work correctly

title.description: The title that will be shown in the BoneMenu when the mod will be missing

barcode.description: The barcode of the mod (pallet). This is used to actually check if it is present in the game

modId.description: The ID of the mod. This is used when installing the missing dependency

color.description: The color of the button in BoneMenu that allows for managing the replacer

id.description: The ID of the replacer, this must be a unique one, two configs with the same ID cannot be registered at the same time

enabled.description: Whether or not the replacer is active, if true it will replace items with the replacements from the categories

categories.description: The categories that hold the actual replacements

name.description: The name of the category which will be shown in the BoneMenu

description.description: The description of the category which will be shown in the BoneMenu

enabled.description: If true, the mod will check for the replacement and replace if found, otherwise the category will be ignored

original.description: The original barcode, this allows also for using RegEx and the Scriban templating engine, but you have to set the type property

replacement.description: The replacement for the original spawnable

type.description: The type of matching, this allows for: compare - the simplest one, checks if original property is the same as the one being spawned, nothing fancy. regex allows for using RegEx in the original property for matching. scriban allows using the Scriban templating engine for matching.
